ygData.subject: RE: [sg-everquest] Discount on games
ygData.msgSnippet: Pls contact the person directly, I dun think he is on this mailing list.  HP no and email address attached below, thx. ... From:	Gary Qui Hong Loong
ygData.messageBody:
Pls contact the person directly, I dun think he is on this mailing list. HP no and email address attached below, thx.

-----Original Message-----
From: Gary Qui Hong Loong [SMTP:kanglun@...]
Sent: 01 December, 2000 12:45 AM
To: sg-everquest@egroups.com
Subject: Re: [sg-everquest] Discount on games

when it's coming ah? I also want a copy heheh
----- Original Message -----
From: "K W Lee" <kw.lee@...>
To: "'* Singapore EQ Mailing List'" <sg-everquest@egroups.com>; "'*
Singapore Online RPGers Mailing List'" <SG-Online-RPGers@egroups.com>; "'*
Singnet Internet Games Mailing List'" <internet-games@...>
Cc: <wrx555@...>
Sent: Thursday, November 30, 2000 11:18 AM
Subject: [sg-everquest] Discount on games


> Hi all,
>
> I got a gamer friend who just started his business to sell PC games. He
> can offer games at 10% discount off retail price.
>
> For those who already can get better discount from ya source, just ignore
> this email. For those who think this is a better price for u, u can
> contact this person:
>
> Jeff
> HP: 96817470 or 93875129
> Email: wrx555@...
>
> Take note that it's SELF-COLLECTION (you guys arrange for a meet-up place
> among yaself).
>
> DISCLAIMER: I dun get any commission on these deals, just helping friends.
> If u need to order anything, dun go thru' me. Instead pls contact Jeff
> directly, thx.
>
> Btw, I'm getting my copy of EQ: SoV from him, hehe.
>
> Ziltus (EQ Innoruuk)
> Dark Flame (UO Baja)
> Ziltus (D2 USwest)
> Raffles (Lineage Beta)
